title: Petpost | Shampoo for Dogs with Dry Itchy Skin - Oatmeal & Chamomile Naturally Heals, Protects, & Rejuvenates Dog Skin & Coat - Oatmeal, Chamomile, Aloe & Yucca Formula (8oz.)
features: ♦ REJUVENATES & NOURISHES SKIN, FUR AND ROOTS with a specially formulated Oatmeal, Chamomile, Aloe, and Yucca formula. We hand selected the best naturally derived ingredients to help heal your dog’s skin and nourish their coat!

♦ HEALTHY, SHINY, SILKY SMOOTH FUR is just a bath away when you have this shampoo! Our specially formulated Oatmeal & Chamomile based dog shampoo is perfect for adding a healthy shine, cleaning, and deodorizing your dog’s coat!
♦ DRY SKIN GONE IN ONE USE of this product! Oatmeal, Chamomile, and Aloe are powerful natural moisturizers that will get deep into your dog’s skin and relieve dry, sensitive skin in just one use!

♦ MADE RIGHT HERE IN THE USA by an environmentally conscious pet company. By using naturally derived ingredients and recyclable packaging, Petpost actively seeks ways to reduce our footprint, so our products can be healthy to the earth and your dog.

♦ 100% HAPPY DOG GUARANTEE If the Petpost Oatmeal & Chamomile Shampoo for Dogs does not work better than other dry skin shampoo for dogs after regular use, *or if you or your pet just don’t like it* we’ll replace it or give you 100% of your money back, no questions asked.
description: We love our dogs - and we want to make sure that they wake up every day feeling happy, healthy, and feeling their best! Unfortunately, many dogs begin to develop dry skin or coats, especially with older age.
If that is your dog - today is your lucky day! We have found that the trouble with most dog shampoo is that they leave your dog looking too oily or smelling like strong perfume. Don't worry,
Petpost Oatmeal & Chamomile Shampoo for Dogs with Dry Skin is different!
Our special, extra-powerful solution contains the highest quality Oatmeal, Chamomile, Yucca, and Aloe that:
Rejuvenates and Nourishes Dry Skin & Coat  Is Made in USA and is Completely Safe to Use on your Dog  Leaves Your Dog with a Shinier, Healthier Looking Coat

100% HAPPY DOG GUARANTEE If the Petpost Oatmeal & Chamomile Shampoo for Dogs does not work better than other dry skin treatments after regular use, *or if you or your pet just don’t like it* we’ll replace it or give you 100% of your money back, no questions asked.
CLICK THE YELLOW 'ADD TO CART' BUTTON FOR YOUR DOG NOW!
